slide.title: Querying (1)
slide.example:
<?php
$m = new Mongo();
// First "found" item:
$record = $m->demo->articles->findOne();

// Search on the _id field being 'derickr'
$record = $m->demo->articles->findOne( array( '_id' => 'derickr' ) );

// Search on the array element key 'title' in the 'articles' field
$record = $m->demo->articles->findOne(
  array(
    'articles.title' => 'Xdebug'
  )
);
?>
